description: This lab provides hands-on experience S3 AWS service, guiding participants through accessing the AWS Management Console, creating an S3 bucket, configuring and using AWS CLI, and uploading files to the S3 bucket.

tasks.description: Open web browser and login to AWS Management Console.
tasks.title: Access AWS Management Console

tasks.description: Create S3 bucket with specified configurations.
tasks.title: Create S3 Bucket

tasks.description: Verify bucket creation in S3 dashboard.
tasks.title: Verify S3 Bucket Creation

tasks.description: Verify AWS CLI configuration by listing S3 buckets.
tasks.title: Verify AWS CLI Configuration

goals.description: Upload a file to the S3 bucket.

tasks.description: Use AWS CLI to upload file to S3 bucket.
tasks.title: Upload File to S3 Bucket

tasks.description: Verify file upload in S3 bucket.
tasks.title: Verify File Upload in S3

goals.title: File Upload to S3

name: AWS Practitioner S3
